title: Artificial Intelligence Transforms Formative Assessment in Further Education
description: In recent years, artificial intelligence (AI) has revolutionised formative assessment practices in the education sector, reducing teacher workload and enhancing learner outcomes. The innovative FirstPass platform, developed in collaboration with NCFE and Bolton College, utilises natural language processing and real-time feedback to support students and teachers. title: Scottish Government Excluded from Westminster’s AI Summit
description: Surprisingly, the Scottish government was conspicuously absent from an AI (Artificial Intelligence) summit hosted by Westminster. The exclusion has raised eyebrows and prompted questions about why Scotland, recognised as a leader in several AI areas, was not invited to participate. title: Midjourney Moves to Dedicated Website, Transforming AI Art Experience
description: In a significant development for the world of AI art, Midjourney, known for its exceptional image generation capabilities, has taken a giant leap forward by transitioning to its dedicated website. title: Ripple: Top Crypto Expert Explains ‘Nobody Can Stop What’s Coming for XRP,’ Highlighting NFTs, Hooks, AMM, EVM Sidechain, and Digital Identity Projects

title: Hong Kong Boosts Green Bonds Initiative with Blockchain Technology
description: Hong Kong allies with leading banks to launch digital green bond sales, driving sustainable financing with blockchain. title: WLD Breaks a Major Barrier, Can It Set a New All-Time High?
description:

At press time, the altcoin was up more than 53%, leaving it trading hands at $3.97. Along with the surge in value, WLD also recorded a whopping 671% increase in its total trading volume […]
